tool_description: An API that allows you to play the Mastermind code-cracking / code-guessing game
name: Mastermind Game
title: Mastermind Game

api_list.name: Make a guess
api_list.description: Make a guess for the challenge.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mastermind-game.p.rapidapi.com/guess"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mastermind-game.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Start a new game
api_list.description: Generate a new challenge. A challenge will only be valid for 10 minutes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mastermind-game.p.rapidapi.com/start"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mastermind-game.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
